item.title: Hope International University
item.description: Welcome to HIU, a private Christian University. HIU provides online undergraduate college classes, traditional on-campus undergraduate and graduate programs, & graduate degrees with over 250 online accredited Christian University courses of academic study, and a commitment to faith, service and to learning. HIU is located in Southern California.
